00033     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00034 
00035         public:
00036 
00037         //----------  management  ----------
00038 
00039         Vector<D, N> () { }
00040         Vector<D, N> (N, ... );
00041 
00042         //----------  access      ----------
00043 
00044         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00045         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00046 
00047         static unsigned dimension (void);
00048 
00049         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00050 
00051         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00052         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00053         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00054 
00055         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00056         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00057         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00058         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s);
00059         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00060         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s);
00061 
00062         N sqnorm (void) const;
00063 
00064         N *data () { return x; }
00065 
00066     private:
00067         N x[D];
00068     };

00080     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00081             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00082             x () {
00083         x[0] = x0;
00084         unsigned i = 0;
00085         va_list argp;
00086         va_start (argp, x0);
00087         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00088             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00089         }
00090         va_end (argp);
00091     }
00092 
00093     //----------  access      ----------
00094 
00098     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00099             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00100         assert(i < D);
00101         return x[i];
00102     }
00103 
00107     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00108             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00109         assert(i < D);
00110         return x[i];
00111     }
00112 
00114     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00115             unsigned Vector<D, N>::dimension (void) {
00116         return D;
00117     }
00118 
00119         //----------  arithmetics ----------

00123     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00124             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00125     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00126     return *this;
00127     }
00128 
00131     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00132             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00133     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00134     return *this;
00135     }
00136 
00139     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00140             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00141     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00142     return *this;
00143     }
00144 
00146     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00147             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00148         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00149         Z = *this;
00150         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00151         return Z;
00152     }
00153 
00156     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00157             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00158     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00159     Z = *this;
00160     return (Z += Y);
00161     }
00162 
00165     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00166             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00167     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00168     Z = *this;
00169     return (Z -= Y);
00170     }
00171 
00174     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00175             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) {
00176     Vector <D, N>Z;
00177     Z = *this;
00178     return Z *= s;
00179     }
00180 
00184     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00185             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00186     N dot = 0.;
00187     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00188         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00189 
00190     return dot;
00191     }
00192 
00195     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00196             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) {
00197     return operator* (1./s);
00198     }
00199 
00201     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00202             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00203     return operator* (*this);
00204     }

00213     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00214             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00215         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00216         o << "<";
00217         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++ )
00218         o << v[i] << ",";
00219         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00220         return o;
00221     }

00228     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00229             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);
00230 
00237     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00238             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);
00239 
00244     template <typename N>
00245             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00246         static Vector<3, N> c;
00247 
00248         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00249         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00250         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00251 
00252         return c;
00253     }
00254 
00260     template <typename N>
00261             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00262         static Vector<4, N> d;
00263         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00264         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00265         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00266         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00267         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00268         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00269 
00270         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00271         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00272         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00273         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00274 
00275         return d;
00276     }
00277 
00281     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00282             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00283         static Vector<D, N> n;
00284         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00285         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00286         return n;
00287     }
00288 }
